|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281;MV88F6281 A0 (DDR2) with ARM926EJ-S CPU (Marvell Feroceon); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 <!-- te --> |cpu1_type_rev = (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;29F2G08AAD; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU64M16DG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:10:75

|exp_if_types = SATA,USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 1MHz 4.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG47E;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;2;,,, 16V/4A 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8708EN;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = stxadmin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, Debian, Arch Linux (Arm)
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 763649024218 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B003IT6YFU |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Marvell]] Kirkwood @1.2GHz :Architecture: ARMv5te *RAM: 128MB (DDR2-800) *Flash: 256MB (NAND) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 *SATA: 2x SATA *LAN: 1x GbE (RJ45) <small> :The GoFlex Net is a device based on the [[Marvell]] Sheeva plug computer ::platform, and is the successor to the [[Seagate Dockstar]]. :Unlike the [[Seagate Dockstar|DockStar]], this device has two SATA ports that are externally ::accessible for the GoFlex range of portable hard drives. :These are standard SATA ports so any bare 2.5" drive can dock in there, but ::a snug and secure fit will only be achieved by using the GoFlex drives.
:There are nine total LEDs accessible: a dual color orange/green LED, and two banks ::of four white LEDs that were originally used as indicators for drive space usage. </small>
==Links of Interest== [http://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/seagate-goflex-net ''Run Linux on the GoFlex Net'']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/seagate/seagate_goflexnet |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/seagate/goflexnet |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = kirkwood |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_xscale |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
